extendedInfo.description: *Uninstall and reinstall can fix most issue**Go to menu and send bug report to us if you have any issues*Advanced Task Killer is also known as ATK. It is a tool to kill applications running. -Ignore List-One tap widget-Auto kill-Customize item heightATK is often used to kill app and clean memory. We do suggest people use ATK manually kill apps instead of auto killing app.1. How to use it (for new users to quick start)?ATK is pretty simple. Open this tool and take a look at the running applications list? Uncheck some apps you don't want to kill (such as Advanced Task Killer and some system apps) Tap the button 'Kill selected apps', it will kill all applications checked. 2. How to use it (for new users to do more)?If you don't want to kill any app, you can tap it on the running applications list. Then it's checking box will turn to gray. 3. Why there are app running that I haven't used or even opened?Some app will start up once you turn on your phone or be invoked by some events. 4. What is ignore list/ignore?Ignore list is for you to ignore some app you don't want to kill. If you long press on the app listed on the main screen of ATK, the menu will pop up, then you can select 'Ignore', the application would be moved to ignore list. When you tap 'Kill selected apps', it won't be killed any more. 5. What is default action for long press?You can set your default action for long press and click on the settings. The system default action for long press is pop-menu. That means you when you long press on the application (displays on the running applications list), a pop-menu would shows up. For example, if you want to switch to the application after you long press on it, you can set the default action of long press to 'Switch to'. 6. Why I lost my network connection after I tap 'kill selected apps'? This is because some apps related with network connection are killed, such as 'voicemail'. You can ignore it instead of killing it. 7. Why my Home reloaded?This is because some apps related with Home are killed. Such as 'HTC Sense', 'Mail'(if it is integrated with Home). You can ignore it instead of killing it. 8. Why I cannot receive notification of Email?This is because you killed 'Email'. Instead of killing it, you need to ignore it. 9. What is Auto Kill?If you want to kill apps automatically you need to choose one of auto-kill level- Safe: Only kill the apps aren't running but still consume memory.- Aggressive: Kill the apps running background and apps aren't running.- Crazy: All apps except for apps you are using with.You should be able to see Auto Kill information shows on the title, like 'Auto-Kill: 12:20'. That means auto kill will start at 12:20, you can also change the frequency to impact the auto kill start time. App killer is only a tool to kill apps and task. It won't help your battery directly. But if you kill any app which consumes battery a lot, you might think app killer is helping your battery.Advanced Task Killer Pro is paid version which doesn't contain ads.Note: For android 2.2 and later version, task manager cannot kill services and front apps, you have to force stop them. If you use task manager to kill them, services might restart; also notification won't be erased from the top bar. So we don't suggest people use task manager kill them.KW: taskiller taskkiller task killer taskmanager manager panel taskpanel process app killer, task killer pro

reviews.title: App Killer is Great
reviews.comment: My family and I really like this App. Unfortunately Android has a nasty habit of not closing apps and I running stuff in background. With this app you can free up memory with out restarting your device.
reviews.author: Lawrence Anderson

reviews.title: Pity this app is needed in the first place!
reviews.comment: The fact that I need this app at all speaks volumes about my device (Sony Xperia Pro) and its persistent low memory issues (even though most of my apps are stored on the SD card). Very useful app to have, but in an ideal world I shouldn\'t need it!
reviews.author: Stuart Cormie

reviews.title: Samsung galaxy centura
reviews.comment: Very good app. Speeds up my phone. And it save battery life too. 5 stars for a great app
reviews.author: Dj Flores

reviews.title: Its okay.
reviews.comment: I give it a 4 star because it saves me memory but stupid Facebook opens all the time and I lose lots of memory and making my phone lag. And sometimes I have to force stop for some apps to run smoothly for a while. I would rate it 5 stars if Facebook would stay closed forever.
reviews.author: Alan Santiago

reviews.title: not a good as i thought
reviews.comment: was recommended to my hubby by a phone shop... i tried but it used more battery than it was saving..... uninstalled
reviews.author: leanne down

reviews.title: Works great
reviews.comment: I\'m using a Double Power t708 tablet. 1.2ghz cortex A8 processor ARMv7, Mali-400 GPU,512mb ram.ICS 4.0.3. Works great no crashes. Kills apps just like it says. Tablet is smoother and faster.
reviews.author: matthew anderson

reviews.title: Good App!
reviews.comment: This app is actually surprisingly good. I love how its so smooth running, and closes the apps that you want it to close instantly. It saves battery life, and helps the memory.of my phone tramemdously! 5 Stars!
reviews.author: Nicolas Williams

reviews.title: Leaves apps open!!!
reviews.comment: I like the idea of this app, but when I kill all apps exit then re enter with out doing anything else, boom there are 90% of the same apps I\'ve just killed open again. This happens 5 or 6 times before all apps are closed. Android task killers have nothing on the iPhone & that makes me sad!!!
reviews.author: Kieron Pulford

reviews.title: OUTSTANDING!!!!!!!!
reviews.comment: Thank you to whoever made this app! I am now stress free as far as my phone goes. I wanted to break it before I found this app. Type delay is no longer there nor 5-10 seconds to load a web page. Awesome!!!
reviews.author: Lonneil Marsh

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: Love it. I finally found the widget that with one click clears the app. I click that button so much! Thanks guys
reviews.author: Trevor Riseling

reviews.title: Good but..
reviews.comment: After update, it doesn\'t kill some apps like Facebook which takes up a lot of memory. So u have to force stop it. My phone is always saying its.low on memory :( please fix the program
reviews.author: Megan Reed

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: Don\'t download. Every time l kill tasks they re-appear after 10 seconds. The best way to kill tasks is by using the built-in task manager on the phone.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: For the first time I saw 100Mb RAM FREE on my Xperia J. Phone is all speeded up. Special mention to widget. Highly useful. Thanks!!
reviews.author: Saish Borkar

reviews.title: Plz read my review
reviews.comment: I had this on my Samsung galaxy s2 phone and it worked great. I\'ve just downloaded it to my new HTC one and when I press close all apps it brings me back to the app store and back on your app.
reviews.author: Valerie Frost

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work on Galaxy S 4
reviews.comment: I\'ve used this app ever since Android first came out. Always worked great. Well on my GS4, it doesn\'t close any apps. I hit, \"close selected\", and the apps remain open. I just use the built in task killer to close them.
reviews.author: Josh Franklin

reviews.title: Does nothing
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t seem to close anything, everything is still running after using this app. Clean Master actually closes stuff for those that want an app that works.
reviews.author: John Doe

reviews.title: not working properly
reviews.comment: I force stopped everything in the task manager then went into settings to manage application and viewed the application that I thought I stopped through task killer and they were still running
reviews.author: edwin v

reviews.title: Killed apps...but also froze them
reviews.comment: I started having a bunch of forfe closes on various apps. I would be in the middle of one app and it would freeze for a min or more then force close. Uninstall!
reviews.author: Dasha Woodward

reviews.title: So baddd
reviews.comment: So bad so baddddd no trabaja xk todas la aplicaci\303\263nes siguen corriendo y no mata ni una como dicee mi bater\303\255a no me dura nada.
reviews.author: Wendy Diacovsky

reviews.comment: It was the best thing to hav cuz these \"androids\" keep havin apps n stuff start up for no GD reson!?? but now I got a new cell with a plan aka a real cell as I cal it but anyways, now every other time I go to drag it down n kill some apps it makes my screen go compleatly Blue and frees to the point I can\'t do ANYTHING but the musick still plays in backround!?? So I just wana kno is the app screwed-up or is my cell not compatible with it??
reviews.author: matthew baserwski
